Hi!

Junit seems to be introducing a problem with my I18N code. 

When I run my application stand alone, it finds the resource bundles 
correctly. But when I run it within the junit framework, it seems to 
use the wrong classloader and thus exceptions out. 

Specifically, the following code results in the following output in 
junit mode:
This Dir = /C:/src/util/Connector/Handler/BusinessLogic/
ClassLoader Dir = /C:/test/util/Connector/

but in stand-alone mode, results in:
This Dir = /C:/src/util/Connector/Handler/BusinessLogic/
ClassLoader Dir = /C:/src/util/Connector/Handler/BusinessLogic/

It should be noted that I'm running under the Eclipse junit runner. 

Anyone have any ideas how to force the correct classloader in both 
scenarios?

-Z
